pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, July 1, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, July 1, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Ceremony for the 100th Anniversary of the Battles of the Somme and Beaumont-Hamel.

LeBreton Gallery
Canadian War Museum
1 Vimy Place
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.
  • Open media coverage



12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Mrs. Grégoire Trudeau will attend the Canada Day Noon Show on Parliament Hill. The Prime Minister will deliver brief remarks.

Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario        

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:30
  • Media are required to be accredited through the Parliamentary Press Gallery.



Media Appearances

12:02 p.m. – A brief interview with the Prime Minister will be broadcast live on CBC
12:04 p.m. – A brief interview will be broadcast live on Radio-Canada


Please note: all times are local.
